column3: (-Cid-)<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, do you hear me? Your opponent is called Alte Roite─no idea what the name means, but good luck!
(-Nero-)Ah, there it is. Catastrophe─a fitting name for the havoc it will doubtless wreak. Have fun, now!
What fools are these who have entered my domain? No matter. You shall remain here for my pleasure.
Finally, it is in my grasp! The power to control all creation! The power of the void!
Why!? The void was mine to command!
(-Cid-)<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, we've located the correct data! Your opponent appears to be...a train!? Here it comes!
(-Nero-)Ah, what a splendid atelier! Look around you, hero. Plenty of things in which to dip that brush!
(-Cid-)The Guardian will transition between a host of different combat programs. Try to keep track of which does what!
I wield the greatest power in existence!
You may as well be the dirt on the bottom of my boots! Or the dirt stuck to the bottom of that dirt!
I will destroy everything! I will create a monument to non-existence!

I lost!? How can I lose!?
I just can't believe it!
